briefTitle: Extension Study of Etelcalcetide in the Treatment of Secondary Hyperparathyroidism (SHPT) in Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) on Hemodialysis
officialTitle: A Multicenter Single-arm Extension Study to Describe the Long-term Efficacy and Safety of AMG 416 in the Treatment of Secondary Hyperparathyroidism in Subjects With Chronic Kidney Disease on Hemodialysis
summary: This study is designed to describe the long-term safety and efficacy of etelcalcetide (AMG 416) for the treatment of SHPT in adults with CKD on hemodialysis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events (AEs)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first dose until 30 days after last dose; the treatment period was 52 weeks.
